recipesJson.name: Berry Buttery Toast
recipesJson.author: Denske
recipesJson.description: Ive been wanting to make use of RF strawberry jam w/ toast since you can get it from Canada now. Also just got VT butter base and I am amazed at the accuracy of this flavor. It is truly the best just butter flavor that has ever been made. This really is a berry delicious buttery piece of toast.

reviews.text: An absolutely wonderful mix. With a nice Berry Punch at the front and a smooth buttery finish. It is now my go to ADV. Keep up the great work thank you :>)
